DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate antiviral effect GS-5806 healthy adult infect strain Respiratory Syncytial Virus .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study GS-5806 Healthy Volunteers Infected With Respiratory Syncytial Virus ( RSV )
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Between 18 45 year old Body Mass Index 18 33 kg/m2 Acute chronic medical illness Positive Human Immunodeficiency Virus , Hepatitis B C Nose nasopharynx abnormality Abnormal lung function
